snippet: Carl Hagelin sparked the Rangers’ second and fourth goals by forcing opponents to turn over the puck, and he used his speed as a devastating forechecking tool.
abstract: New York Rangers rookie Carl Hagelin wastes no time in his postseason debut against the Ottawa Senators, sparking the Rangers second and fourth goals by forcing Ottawa turnovers; Hagelin uses his speed as a devastating forechecking tool.
lead_paragraph: Carl Hagelin sparked the Rangers’ second and fourth goals by forcing opponents to turn over the puck, and he used his speed as a devastating forechecking tool.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Hagelin Wastes No Time in Playoff Debut
headline.main: Rangers Rookie Wastes No Time in Postseason Debut
headline.print_headline: Rangers Rookie Wastes No Time in Postseason Debut
